message: Hi Bob, I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. Given that money devalues more quickly for you (10% per round) than for me (5% per round), it's in both our interests to reach an agreement soon. This is a fair offer considering these circumstances.

Alice, I understand your point about the devaluation, but your initial offer was too skewed in your favor. I propose a 45/55 split. This recognizes the time pressure we both face while still being more equitable.
